statusLine.command:
#!/bin/bash

# Read JSON input from stdin
input=$(cat)

# Extract values
cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')
project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir')
model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')
output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name')
cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0')

# Build status parts
status_parts=()

# Show directory (relative to project if in git repo)
if [ -n "$project_dir" ] && [ "$project_dir" != "null" ]; then
    # Calculate relative path
    rel_path="${cwd#$project_dir}"
    if [ -z "$rel_path" ]; then
        dir_display="$(basename "$project_dir")"
    else
        dir_display="$(basename "$project_dir")$rel_path"
    fi
else
    dir_display="$cwd"
fi
status_parts+=("$dir_display")

# Show git branch if in a repo
if [ -n "$project_dir" ] && [ "$project_dir" != "null" ]; then
    branch=$(cd "$cwd" && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null)
    if [ -n "$branch" ]; then
        status_parts+=("$branch")
    fi
fi

# Show model
status_parts+=("$model_name")

# Show output style if not default
if [ "$output_style" != "default" ] && [ "$output_style" != "null" ]; then
    status_parts+=("$output_style")
fi

# Show session cost
cost_display=$(printf '$%.2f' "$cost")
status_parts+=("$cost_display")

# Join with separator and print
printf '%s' "${status_parts[0]}"
for ((i=1; i<${#status_parts[@]}; i++)); do
    printf ' Â· %s' "${status_parts[i]}"
done
